title: Education / Workshops
content: We are passionate about education and are dedicated to sharing our passion with you. Our team is currently working on creating a premiere education department; so you can have a personalized experience in learning The Meraki Way!

title: Join our Team
content: We are honored by your interest in joining our team! If you are interested in joining our team or renting a booth please send an email of interest with your resume to : Management@merakiloungesd.com

memberships.title: Standard Blow- Dry Membership
memberships.desc: Receive two (2) blow-dry services a month and get 10% off Kerastase Fusio- Dose & K18 Treatments. (10% off treatments are only valid for use on the standard blow dry membership services)

memberships.title: Premium Blow Dry Membership
memberships.desc: Pamper yourself with four (4) blow-dry services a month and get 10% off retail products, Kerastase Fusio Dose & K18 Treatments (10% off treatments are only valid for use on the standard blow-dry membership services) Enjoy a free Fusio- Dose or K18 treatment the month of your birthday!

memberships.title: Standard Blow Dry Membership (thick, long, curly or extensions)
memberships.desc: Receive two (2) blow dry services a month and get a 10% off Kerastase Fusio- Dose & K18 Treatments. (10% off treatments are only valid for use on the standard blow dry membership services.)

memberships.title: Premium Blow-Dry Membership (thick, long, curly or extensions)
memberships.desc: Pamper yourself with four (4) blow-dry services a month and get 10% off Retail Products, Kerastase Fusio-Dose, & K18 Treatments (10% off treatments are only valid for use on the standard bow-dry membership services) Enjoy a free Fusio-Dose or K18 Treatment the month of your birthday

title: Collaboration Inquires
content: Please Contact ashlee@revisionstudios.co with all marketing + PR inquiries.
